content: Hello! How can I assist you today? Are you looking for something special or do you have any questions about our products?

Sure thing! Are you looking for a perfume for yourself or as a gift? Also, do you have a preferred scent profile, like floral, woody, or fresh? Let me know so I can make the best recommendation for you!
what did I ask you earlier?
You asked me to suggest a perfume. Would you like to tell me more about what you're looking for so I can help you find the perfect scent?
